column4: Yes, Ubuntu 9.04 has been EOL for a *long* time. Upgrade immediately.
Even with dial up you should be able to download an Ubuntu 12.04 LTS iso in less than a week.
Use wget, then you can continue partial downloads.
And when you do upgrade, go for 12.04 LTS, as that will be supported for much longer than 12.10 (or any other version until the next LTS release).
